exceptions.tactic: intros a b Hz_a Hz_b Hz_ppc.

original: intros a b Hz_a Hz_b Hz_ppc. unfold not in Hz_a. unfold not in Hz_b. unfold ppcm. intros s Hdivqa Hdivqb Hdivqs Hdivsp Hdivsq. apply ppcm0. intros r Hdivr_p Hdivr_q. apply div_clean_dec1. destruct Hz_ppc as [Ha _]. apply Ha. apply nzeroP_multTerm. apply cs. apply eqA_dec. apply Hz_a. apply Hz_b. apply Hdivqa. apply Hdivqb. apply Hdivr_p. apply Hdivr_q. apply divTerm_ppc with (a:=a) (b:=b). apply Hz_a. apply Hz_b. apply Hz_ppc. apply Hdivqs. apply Hdivsp. apply Hdivsq.
